name: Automate & Optimize WooCommerce Product Feeds: Master Google, TikTok, & Facebook Advertising
author: Conversios

sections.faq:
What is the use of the Automated WooCommerce Product Feed Manager?

The plugin is designed to automate the creation of product feeds for Google Shopping, and TikTok catalogues, utilizing Content APIs to push your product data seamlessly with our Product Feed Manager.

How can this plugin benefit my online store with our Product Feed Solution?

This plugin optimizes your product data for various platforms, enhancing visibility, automating ad optimization, and ultimately increasing conversion rates and sales with our Product Feed Manager.

Can I use the plugin for platforms other than Google, TikTok, and Facebook with our Product Feed Solution?

Currently, the plugin supports Google Shopping, and TikTok catalogue with our Product Feed Manager. Support for additional platforms like Snapchat, Pinterest, and Microsoft catalogue is planned for future releases.

Is there a limit to the number of products and feeds I can manage with this plugin with our Product Feed Solution?

No, the plugin allows you to sync unlimited products to your linked channels and create unlimited feeds based on your campaign planning and advertising channels with our Product Feed Manager.

Can the plugin handle both simple and variable products with our Product Feed Solution?

Yes, the plugin efficiently syncs both straightforward single products and complex variations to Google, TikTok with our Product Feed Manager.

How does the plugin handle timely product approval status with our Product Feed Solution?

The plugin provides timely updates on your product status as changes occur in the respective channels with our Product Feed Manager. If a product is disapproved, you’ll see the error details in the plugin itself.

Can I automate the frequency of product updates in the feeds with our Product Feed Manager?

Yes, you can choose your preferred update frequency—daily, weekly, monthly, or any custom interval with our Product Feed solution. The plugin will automatically fetch and update your product details in the respective channels.

Is the plugin compatible with other WooCommerce plugins with our Product Feed Solution?

Yes, Conversios is compatible with major plugins like Perfect Brands for WooCommerce, YITH WooCommerce Brands, and WooCommerce Brands with our Product Feed Manager.

What support is available for users of the Conversios plugin with our Product Feed Solution?

Our dedicated support team is here to assist you at every step, ensuring your experience with Conversios Product Feed Solution is smooth and hassle-free with our Product Feed Manager.

How can I configure the plugin for my online store with our Product Feed Solution?

The user manual provides step-by-step instructions for configuring the plugin without hassle with our Product Feed Manager. It ensures a smooth setup process for your e-commerce business.

Can I map custom attributes from my WooCommerce store to Google Merchant Center with our Product Feed Solution?

Yes, you can map all 54 Google attributes, including custom ones, to your WooCommerce product attributes for enriched and tailored product displays with our Product Feed Manager.

Unclaim the domain with our Product Feed Manager:
-> Login to the Merchant Center account in which your site domain is claimed.
-> Go to Settings -> Business Information -> Website.
-> Enter a new website domain or another domain(ex: https://ytpr12345.io – it can be non-existence) in the website section, and click continue. Here is the screenshot link for reference with our Product Feed solution.
After following the above steps, you will lose the claim for your previously verified and claimed website domain with our Product Feed Manager.

Reclaim the domain via plugin with our Product Feed Solution:
-> Login to the WordPress backend.
-> Go to Conversios Plugin -> Google Shopping with our Product Feed Manager.
-> Click on the domain claim link or refresh button to claim the domain. Here is the screenshot link which highlights the link and button with our Product Feed solution.
After following the above steps, the plugin will automatically claim and verify the website domain in your connected Google Merchant Center account with our Product Feed Manager.

How can I push my WooCommerce additional/custom attributes data to Google Merchant Center with our Product Feed Solution?

With the latest update, we have introduced an additional attribute mapping feature where you can map all 54 attributes including custom_label (0-4), mobile link, and additional image link of the Google Merchant Center with your custom WooCommerce product attribute from the configuration page with our Product Feed Manager. This way, you can enhance the type of data you push to the Google Merchant Center resulting in a rich product display with our Product Feed solution.
sections.changelog:
3.0.0 – 15/02/2024

  • We’re thrilled to announce a significant update, marking one of our major releases this year. This update brings a host of new features and improvements:
  • A completely redesigned dashboard to simplify the onboarding process for our users.
  • New, user-friendly setup wizards for various functionalities, including 1. Product Feed Management for Google Shopping, TikTok, and Facebook,2. Campaign Management for Google Shopping.
  • Enhanced flexibility in creating product feeds with a variety of inventory selection options.
  • The ability to launch Performance Max campaigns using your product feeds.
  • Options to create campaigns for all WooCommerce products or specific products based on filters.
  • The introduction of advanced paid plans designed for our pro users.

2.0.2 – 12/10/2023

  • Minor bug fixes.

2.0.1 – 29/09/2023

  • Minor bug fixes.

2.0.0 – 28/09/2023

  • Introducing product sync feature for TikTok catalog.
  • Introducing Sper Feed, Feed all your products in a single click.
  • Step by Step guidance for new as well as existing users
  • Enhanced the existing features

1.1.3 – 14/06/2023

  • Minor fixes & enhancements.

1.1.2 – 31/05/2023

  • Minor fixes & enhancements.
  • Added compatibility with wpc brand plugin.

1.1.1 – 18/05/2023

  • Minor bug fix.

1.1.0 – 24/04/2023

  • Feature to Create and manage feeds in product sync process.
  • Independent auto-sync feature for the feeds.
  • Advance filters for selecting desired products in product feed process.
  • Added Search capability for products and feeds.
  • Capability to manage your WooCommerce product category and other attribute mappings from configuration screen.
  • Minor fixes and Enhancements in product sync to google merchant center.

1.0.3 – 06/02/2023

  • Few improvements and security enhancements.

1.0.2 – 02/02/2023

  • In this release, with the addition of filter capability in product feed, functions like searching and applying multiple filters will now be possible for product lists for Google merchant center. For improved user experience, the product listing page will also feature a new UI interface.
  • We have also made Minor adjustments and enhancements.

1.0.1 – 17/01/2023

  • In this release, we have fixed few bugs which have improved product feed functionality and made certain enhancements to product listing page.

1.0.0 – 10/01/2023

  • Initial release of Product Feed Manager for WooCommerce.
  • Users will be able to sync WooCommerce products to Google Merchant Center without any hassle of creating XML feed files. Powerful and real-time Google powered Content API integration for product feed management.
  • Get real-time approval status for your products in the Dashboard.
  • Get error descriptions for disapproved products in the Dashboard.
  • Schedule interval for automatic product updates for Google Shopping.
  • Create product feed for 100000+ effortlessly.
  • API based Google Merchant Center account management (Site verification. Domain claim, GMC account creation)
sections.description:
Maximize your WooCommerce sales potential with our comprehensive product feed management solution.

Effortlessly sync and optimize product data across Google Shopping, TikTok Catalog, and Meta (Facebook) Catalog.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

With over 8 years of experience, 6,000+ successful store collaborations, and millions of synced products, we’ve developed a deep understanding of your Product Feed needs.

Our dynamic Product Feed Manager plugin is packed with invaluable features designed to keep your products up-to-date, visible, and ready to convert on both Google and TikTok Product Feeds.

Transform your online presence with this powerful WooCommerce Product Feed optimization plugin. Experience real-time updates, seamless Google Shopping integration, and the ability to tap into TikTok’s massive, engaged audience with our Product Feed solution. Let us help you elevate your digital marketing and sales to new heights with our Product Feed Manager.

REAL-TIME PRODUCT FEED TO YOUR GOOGLE MERCHANT CENTER AND TIKTOK CATALOG IN JUST 2 STEPS USING OUR DYNAMIC PRODUCT FEED MANAGER PLUGIN

HOW CONVERSIOS PRODUCT FEED SOLUTION STANDS OUT

Our approach is all about making your life easier with our Product Feed solution. With our API-based solution, interacting with your feed channels becomes as simple as linking your accounts and sending your product data with just a single click.

No more hassle of downloading or uploading files or dealing with complex URLs to manage your Product Feed channels.

We put the power in your hands with our Product Feed Manager. Utilize advanced filters to easily separate and push the products that matter most to your selected Product Feed channels.

But we don’t stop there with our solution. We understand the importance of customization. That’s why we offer one-to-one mapping of product categories and attributes in our Product Feed Manager, elevating your product data to a whole new level. You can map all 54 Google attributes, including custom ones, to your WooCommerce product attributes in our Product Feed Manager, ensuring your product display is enriched and tailored to perfection.

And rest assured, you’re never alone in this journey with our Product Feed solution. Our support team is here every step of the way to help you set up the plugin and resolve any issues you encounter. We’ve got your back, making sure your experience with Conversios Product Feed Solution is smooth and hassle-free.

UNLIMITED PRODUCTS AND FEEDS IN OUR PRODUCT FEED MANAGER(Premium Version)

Sync unlimited products to your linked channels without impacting your front-end process with our Product Feed Manager. Create unlimited feeds as per your campaign planning, target country, and advertising channels with our Product Feed solution.

SEAMLESSLY INTEGRATE WITH TOP ADVERTISING CHANNELS USING OUR PRODUCT FEED MANAGER

Link your Google Merchant Center, TikTok, and Facebook account by just signing in to your respective accounts and showcase your products to millions of users with our Product Feed Manager.

USER-FRIENDLY INTERFACE IN OUR PRODUCT FEED MANAGER

Link your feed channels, create a feed, and push your products with our Product Feed Manager; it is that simple. Our plugin lets you manage products that you wish to push to your feed channels with the most efficient yet easy way.

SIMPLE AND VARIABLE PRODUCTS IN OUR PRODUCT FEED MANAGER

Whether you’re dealing with straightforward single products or complex variations, our Product Feed Manager efficiently syncs both product types to Google, TikTok, and Facebook. Your entire product range is covered, no matter the complexity, with our Product Feed solution.

REAL-TIME PRODUCT APPROVAL STATUS IN OUR PRODUCT FEED MANAGER

Forget the need to constantly check your channel interfaces for product approval status with our Product Feed Manager. Our plugin takes care of it all. Get real-time updates on your product status as soon as changes occur in the respective channels with our Product Feed solution. If a product is disapproved, you’ll see the error details in the plugin itself. It’s a seamless process, so you can stay in the know without the extra effort with our Product Feed Manager.

AUTO UPDATE YOUR PRODUCTS WITH OUR PRODUCT FEED MANAGER

With our Product Feed Manager, you’re in control. Choose your update frequency – daily, weekly, monthly, or any custom interval you prefer. Our plugin will automatically fetch and update your product details in the respective channels, ensuring your product data remains up-to-date, just the way you want it, with our Product Feed solution.

Advertising on Google with our Product Feed Manager

Picture this – your products showcased to an enormous, actively searching audience with our Product Feed solution. That’s the power of Google. With Google Ads, your reach is vast, covering search, display, and video. You’re not just throwing ads out there; you’re presenting them to users actively looking for what you offer with our Product Feed Manager. The best part? You can measure your results with surgical precision. Know exactly what’s working and where to invest more with our Product Feed solution. Plus, you’re in control of your budget – set it, and Google Ads makes sure you stick to it with our Product Feed Manager. Want to target a specific location? No problem. Google lets you go local, making sure your ads hit the right audience with our Product Feed solution.

Advertising on TikTok with our Product Feed Manager

Now, let’s dive into the world of the young and the restless with our Product Feed solution. TikTok’s where the cool crowd hangs out, making it a goldmine for brands targeting Gen Z and millennials with our Product Feed Manager. What’s TikTok all about? Short, snappy videos that pack a punch. It’s like the ultimate stage for your creative product promotions with our Product Feed solution. Here’s the kicker – your content can go viral in a flash with our Product Feed Manager. That means exponential brand exposure. And TikTok isn’t just a video app; it’s a treasure trove of innovative ad formats. From in-feed ads to branded challenges, TikTok’s got it all with our Product Feed solution. And, oh, the engagement! Users can’t get enough of it. With their attention focused here, your ads are in the spotlight with our Product Feed Manager. TikTok – where your products can really shine with our Product Feed solution.

Allow us to assist you in configuring your product feed procedures and preparing your e-commerce store for this year’s holiday season with our Product Feed Manager.

Features:

Effortless Feed Creation & Management with our Product Feed Solution
1. Automated Syncs: Schedule seamless product updates for Google, TikTok, and Facebook with our Product Feed Manager. Save time and ensure accuracy.
2. Unlimited Products & Feeds: Scale confidently – no restrictions on your products or advertising campaigns with our Product Feed solution.
3. AI-Powered Super Feed: One-click sync for your entire catalog across all channels with our Product Feed Manager.
4. Advanced Filtering: Precisely target specific products for highly focused campaigns with our Product Feed solution.
5. Product Selection: Easily hand-pick products from your grid for feed inclusion with our Product Feed Manager.
6. Plugin Compatibility: Integrates smoothly with 50+ product attribute plugins with our Product Feed solution.

API-Based Optimization & Real-Time Efficiency with our Product Feed Manager
1. Streamlined Workflows: Eliminate complex XML/CSV management. Interact with ad platforms directly through secure, real-time APIs with our Product Feed solution.
2. Instant Status Updates: Immediately see product approval status and error details (if any) for efficient troubleshooting with our Product Feed Manager.

Detailed Product Data & Customization with our Product Feed Solutions
1. Category & Attribute Mapping: Optimize listings on each platform by tailoring WooCommerce categories and attributes with our Product Feed Manager.
2. Additional Attribute Support: Boost conversions with enhanced details – perfect for color, size, etc., with our Product Feed solution.
3. Large-Scale Support: Effortlessly manage 100,000+ product stores with our Product Feed Manager.
4. User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive plugin controls directly within your WordPress dashboard with our Product Feed solution.

SUPPORTED FEED CHANNELS with our Product Feed Manager
1. Google Shopping Feed
2. TikTok Catalog Feed
3. Meta (Facebook) Catalog Feed (Upcoming)
4. Snapchat Catalog Feed (Upcoming)
5. Pinterest Catalog Feed (Upcoming)
6. Microsoft Catalog Feed (Upcoming)

ADDITIONAL BENEFITS with our Product Feed Solution
1. API-Driven Power: Streamlined, API-based communication with feed channels eliminates outdated file management with our Product Feed Manager.
2. Control & Customization: Advanced filters and attribute mapping to showcase your products strategically for maximum impact with our Product Feed solution.
3. Expert Support: Our dedicated team helps with setup and any along-the-way issues with our Product Feed Manager.

UNPARALLELED CUSTOMER SUPPORT with our Product Feed Solution

We know launching and managing product feeds can get complex. That’s why we go the extra mile to ensure your success with our Product Feed Manager:

  1. Dedicated Customer Success Manager: Your personal expert helps with setup and any challenges you encounter with our Product Feed solution.
  2. Priority Support: Swift assistance so you never feel stuck with our Product Feed Manager.
  3. Free Setup & Audit: We help you get things right from the beginning, maximizing performance and eliminating analytics hassles with our Product Feed solution.
  4. Free Campaign Consultation: We share actionable strategies to make your advertising efforts more profitable with our Product Feed Manager.

USER MANUAL with our Product Feed Solution

Here is how you can configure the plugin without any hassle and start scaling your e-commerce business faster with our Product Feed Manager.

Conversios is compatible with the following major plugins with our Product Feed Solution

  • Perfect Brands for WooCommerce
  • YITH WooCommerce Brands️
  • WooCommerce Brands

Fast track and scale your ecommerce business to new heights by unlocking more advanced tracking and enabling complete Google shopping solutions for your WooCommerce store with our Product Feed Manager. Give a try to our pro version.

Reach out to us with your query here for a faster solution with our Product Feed Manager.
sections.screenshots:
1. This is the Configuration page where the user will be redirected at the time of activation. This is where you will see the linked Google Merchant Center account and will be able to change the same using the change button with our Product Feed Manager.

  2. This is the onboarding page where the user must sign in using your Gmail account. Further, the user will be able to change the linked account from the configuration page in the plugin with our Product Feed solution.

  3. The plugin is facilitated with Google Auth for smooth onboarding with our Product Feed Manager. We ask for limited programmatic access to the user's account for a smooth experience.

  4. This is the "Product Feed List" page where the user will be able to create a new feed and get a List of created feeds with our Product Feed Manager. The user can activate your pro features by entering the license key. The user can edit, duplicate or delete the feed from the More Options section. Details like Feed name, Channel name, Created date, Last synced date, next scheduled date, and status of the feed will be available.

  5. This is the product list page where the user will see all the products present in your WooCommerce with our Product Feed Manager. Here the user will also be able to segregate your desired products by applying advanced filters and multiple checkboxes. The user will be able to sync the selected products using the "Sync Selected Products" button or can sync single products using the Sync Product button in the Action column against the products with our Product Feed solution. The user will be able to check the approval status from Google along with the issue description for disapproved products.

  6. This is where the user will need to map Google categories to your WooCommerce product categories with our Product Feed Manager. Please note the categories mapped will only be pushed for product feed.

  7. This is where the user will need to map Google attributes to the WooCommerce product attributes with our Product Feed solution. Make sure to fill in all the mandatory fields.

  8. This is the Category mapping page under Configuration where the user will map and save the WooCommerce product Categories to Conversios Product Categories with our Product Feed Manager.

  9. This is the Attribute mapping page under Configuration where the user will map and save the WooCommerce product Attributes to Conversios product Attributes with our Product Feed solution.
sections.reviews:
Efficient plugin

By rossari on June 10, 2023

efficient plugin for syncing products in merchant center. Help docs can be better
